title: There is one surefire way to bring down SKT.

replies.body: The last time a team tried that, Marin ended up killing everybody.
Statistically, Faker is the worst player on SKT.

Yeah, let's totally ignore that Easyhoon started games 1 and 2 today and Faker only got to play once they had the series in the bag. 

Typical Faker fanboy:
https://media.giphy.com/media/t0JS9iwjMxlFC/giphy.gif
Why does everyone think Faker is the sole reason SKT wins? The rest of the team is there too, y'know. If it was just Faker with a bunch of Bronzies they wouldn't be in Worlds, or heck even Platinum.
yeah Marin has been outperforming Faker

With how often Faker gets camped and focused, even when he's super behind, I'd be out performing Faker. lol. I mean, have you seen some their thirst for Faker? They will purposely ignore everything around them and focus Faker as if he's a Teemo. Faker may as well just play Teemo and see how much of a global taunt we can get.
